TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleClientFactory extends System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory
Public NotInheritable Class OracleClientFactory Inherits DbProviderFactory
public ref class OracleClientFactory sealed : System::Data::Common::DbProviderFactory

Docs.summary: Represents a set of methods for creating instances of the Oracle provider's implementation of the data source classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework. For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.Common.DbCommand CreateCommand() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateCommand () As DbCommand

Docs.returns: A new strongly typed instance of .

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code fragment returns a strongly typed <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> instance.
```vb Dim newFactory As OracleClientFactory = OracleClientFactory.Instance Dim command As DbCommand = newFactory.CreateCommand() ```
```csharp OracleClientFactory newFactory = OracleClientFactory.Instance; DbCommand command = newFactory.CreateCommand(); ```

Public Shared ReadOnly Instance As OracleClientFactory

Docs.summary: Gets an instance of the , which can be used to retrieve strongly typed data objects.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code fragment uses the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleClientFactory.Instance> field to retrieve an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleClientFactory> instance and then return a strongly typed <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> instance.
```vb Dim newFactory As OracleClientFactory = OracleClientFactory.Instance Dim command As DbCommand = newFactory.CreateCommand() ```
```csharp OracleClientFactory newFactory = OracleClientFactory.Instance; DbCommand command = newFactory.CreateCommand(); ```
